name: Jack the runner
description:
The game plunges the player into a huge maze where he will have to run as far as he can before his endurance gauge is empty. The maze is extremely vast, and consists only of Left/Right branches.
During his Run, the player will have to make a direction decision quickly, otherwise chance will decide for him.
When he reaches a dead end, he starts again from the beginning for a new Run.

If he decides to run like a derail to the end of his endurance gauge, let him avoid the deadly traps scattered in the many dead ends of the labyrinth and enjoy a chance that we will describe here as "insolent" ...

... he will perhaps reach one of the mysterious dead ends of the labyrinth, thus offering him glory and wealth.

Here we go again for a run.

Objective of the game: 
Collect the recovered items scattered throughout the labyrinth (fixed and random positions).
Progress through the labyrinth to discover its nooks, crannies and mysteries.

On the menu: 
An exciting and long-lasting labyrinth exploration. 
A huge collection of artefacts and objects to be completed. 
A game based on perseverance and luck.
